content.rendered:
[vc_row top_margin=”page-margin-top”][vc_column width=”1/6″]

Not sure what your looking for?

For any questions please visit our FAQ’s page.

Here's What We Offer:

* FLAT-RATE: We offer flat-rate, so you know what you’re paying upfront.

* SUPPLIES & EQUIPMENT: We provide all supplies, high-quality equipment and use eco-friendly products.

* SERVICE GUARANTEE: If you’re not happy with the service we provide we’ll send a team out to re-clean at no charge.

* SAFETY: Our cleaners are background checked & trustworthy.

COVID19: Safe protective equipment (facemask, shoe-covers, cleaning gloves). 

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″]
Service Request Form
***WE CURRENTLY ONLY OFFER SERVICES TO CAMBRIDGE, SOMERVILLE, BOSTON, BROOKLINE, NEWTON, WATERTOWN, WALTHAM, BELMONT, ARLINGTON, MEDFORD, MALDEN, EVERETT, AND RHODE ISLAND**

Please select your services

****The final cost will be based on the accuracy of your responses to these questions; please fill out the form as accurately as possible to avoid any increases in the final price.****
Please select there you live in a residential home or an apartment building.
"Recurring Services" Incur a $50 one time charge on the first cleaning. Follow up payments will be discussed during the first cleaning session,
"Moving In/Out" Incur an Additional $50 Charge. (refrigerator/Oven included. Must be empty)
"One Time Services" Incur an Additional $100 Charge.
"Deep Cleaning" incur an Additional $150 Charge - (refrigerator and oven included)
Standard home size: Chosen number of bedroom/s & bathrooms to be covered, only one of the following: kitchen, living room, dining room. Staircase and halls are also included.

Apartments - 1 Full Bathrooms Included
House - 2 Full Bathrooms Included
Additional Bathrooms - Full Bathroom $25 / Half-Bathroom $15
